cause.description:
This is just basically for anyone who has had this happen to them, and to make people aware that shit like this does happen, and could happen to anyone. Also, for people to be more aware and alert when driving for dumbass people on the road, and to drive with caution.
1. Be alert and aware of your surroundings when driving
2. Understand that there are assholes out there
cause.mission: make people aware of the assholes out there and to enforce the importance of being aware and alert when driving.
cause.name: Hit and Run Accidents
